string.name: aboutme
string.br: In Malaysia there is a BMF campaign called "Buy Muslim First". This campaign given a huge impact where the Muslim community in Malaysia regardless of race has been trying to get a Muslim-made product on the market. \n

However, there are issues where they are difficult to determine and find a Muslim-made product in the market. Due to these issues, the idea is to develop an application to enable them to find and identify Muslim-made products. \n
In addition, the application also aims to increase the promotion of Islamic-made product, it will indirectly given impact on the economy of Muslims in Malaysia. \n

string.name: contactme
string.br: Developer : NOR ARIF AFIFI BIN NORDIN \n

string.name: searchme
string.br: Search the detail of Muslim product. \n

string.name: scan
string.br: Scan the barcode of product to get the detail of product. \n

string.name: locat
string.br: Use to identify locations of supermarket that sell Muslim product. \n
